casebody.data:
Second Department,

August, 1949.

(August 30, 1949.) In the Matter of Estelle Aaronson, Appellant-Respondent, against William D. Meisser et al., Constituting the Board of Elections of Nassau County, Respondents, and Leonard R. Hanower et al., Respondents-Appellants. In the Matter of Joseph Ross et al., Appellants-Respondents, against William D. Meisser et al., Constituting the Board of Elections of Nassau County, Respondents, and Leonard R. Hanower et al., Respondents-Appellants. (Consolidated Proceedings.)

No opinion. Permission to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. Nolan, P. J., Adel, Sneed, Wenzel and MacCrate, JJ., concur.
